DOC.brief_title: Physiological Molecular Influences Astaxanthin Supplementation Heat Strain Humans
DOC.detailed_description: 34 young , healthy civilian volunteer participate study . After read signing informed consent form , subject undergo medical examination interview nutritionist ass dietary intake Astaxanthin . They undergo 3 day train cognitive testing software . During first stage , consume Astaxanthin free diet , subject participate physiological test : heat tolerance test ( HTT ) , thermo-neutral test ( TTT ) maximal oxygen consumption test ( VO2max ) 3 separate day . During second stage , subject randomly blindly assign either placebo Astaxanthin supplementation arm , undergo 35-40 day supplementation . Physiological test second stage take place 31st 35th ( 40th - optional ) day supplementation include HTT , TTT VO2max 3 separate day .
